: : Rodimus Prime : :

Rodimus Prime: Sleep honey, sleep.


airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Elita:

Elita was calming down. It was as that time, just a thing had 
changed: she was smelling other escent and not was like she 
remembered, it was daddy's. She didn't know that one day she would 
face that sounds and her own fears


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> Rodimus notices that the sounds of the tape are effecting his 
daughter. He turns the tape off, and hold her tight. He thinks about 
how this place wasn't the best to raise a child. Elita didn't need to 
be in a warzone like earth.
> 
> : : Kup : :
> 
> Meanwhile Kup looks too Yggdrasil.
> 
> Kup: If our team is selected then lets contact them and get out 
there.
> 
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:Elita:
> 
> Elita cuddle against her dad when she heard the shots in the 
> speakers of her dad's tape. It remember her a traumatic part of her 
> past, altought she didn't knew exactly what had happened there. 
That 
> sounds were like when she born... altought she could see anything 
of 
> what was going on there. The sounds did that she remember a 
familiar 
> scent (her mommy's scent)altought she couldn't remember at whom 
> belonged it
>
